mDefaultValidPlacementMaterial.description: Material on hologram for valid placement. @note Do not set in code!

mDefaultValidPlacementMaterialSimplified.description: Material on hologram for valid placement. @note Do not set in code!

mDefaultInvalidPlacementMaterial.description: Material on hologram for invalid placement. @note Do not set in code!

mDefaultInputConnectionMaterial.description: Material on hologram for input connections. @note Do not set in code!

mDefaultOutputConnectionMaterial.description: Material on hologram for output connections. @note Do not set in code!

mDefaultNeutralConnectionMaterial.description: Material on hologram for directionally neutral connections. @note Do not set in code!

mDefaultPowerConnectionMaterial.description: Material on hologram for power connections. @note Do not set in code!

mDefaultConveyorConnectionFrameMesh.description: Mesh used to visualize input or output connections location. @note Do not set in code!

mDefaultConveyorConnectionArrowMesh.description: Mesh used to visualize input or output connections direction. @note Do not set in code!

mDefaultPipeConnectionFrameMesh.description: Mesh used to visualize pipeline connections location  @note Do not set in Code!

mDefaultPipeConnectionArrowMesh.description: Mesh used to visualize pipeline connections direction (Consumer / Producer) @note Do not set in code!

mDefaultPowerConnectionMesh.description: Mesh used to visualize power connections. @note Do not set in code!

mClearanceMesh.description: Mesh used to visualize the clearance mesh on factories @note Do not set in code!

mClearanceMaterial.description: Material on hologram for clearance. @note Do not set in code!

mHologramLoopSound.description: Default sound loop placed on holograms.

mHologramSnapSound.description: Snapping sound for holograms, e.g. when a conveyor snaps to an output.

mBuildGuideMesh.description: Mesh used to visualize alignment in build mode. @note Do not set in code!

mBuildGuideMaterial.description: Material applied to build guides to visualize alignment in build mode. @note Do not set in code!

mConveyorBuildGuideMaterial.description: Material applied to build guides specifically for conveyor belts to visualize alignment in build mode. @note Do not set in code!

mInventoryDropCrate.description: Crate spawned when we dismantle an actor or when we die. It will be filled with the refund if it doesn't fit in the players inventory.

mPowerShardClass.description: The default class we use for over clocking buildings

mConstructionSounds.description: Default sound played when constructing a building, a random from the list is played.

mDismantleSounds.description: Default sound played when dismantling a building, a random from the list is played.

mBuildEffect.description:
Effect to play when a building is built
[DavalliusA:Mon/01-04-2019] seems to only be used for replays? //@TODO: see if we can't store this in a way more suitable for replays... a waste to have it in a global class like this

mDismantleEffect.description:
Effect to play when a building is dismantled
[DavalliusA:Mon/01-04-2019] seems to never ba used? //@TODO: see if we can't remove this

mDismantlePendingMaterial.description: Material used when looking at buildings for dismantle

mBuildGunClass.description: The default buildgun class to spawn

mResourceScannerClass.description: The default resource scanner class to spawn

mResourceMinerClass.description: The default resource miner class to spawn

mLegMesh.description: The mesh to be used as legs on factories

mFootMesh.description: The mesh to be used as foots on factories

mMaxFeetLength.description: Maximum length when we want to spawn the legs

mDismantleShortcutClass.description: The class we want to spawn for dismantle shortcuts

mRecipeShortcutClass.description: The class we want to spawn for recipe shortcuts

mShortcutMap.description: Names if the input actions that defines the shortcuts. This maps directly to their index (so first entry here should mean that it should call ExecuteShortcut 0)

mFluidToInventoryStackRate.description: Default rate of converting FluidBox content into inventory stacks. Measured in Liters / Second

mInventoryStackToFluidRate.description: Default rate of converting Inventory stacks in to Fluid for FluidBox content. Measured in Liters / Second
